name: Evacuate? (V)
Lore: 'Escape pods are on many starships allowing those in peril to flee, an act considered cowardly by Imperial officers. ''We''ve analyzed their attack, sir, and there is a danger.''',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to traget your character of ability > 3 alone at a site. USED: During any move phase, take target into hand. LOST: If opponent has exactly one non-spy character at target''s site, place target in Used Pile.',
